Sentencas: The goal of the current work was to identify an air-side-optimized contact material for La0.3Ca0.7Fe0.7Cr0.3O3-delta (LCFCr) electrodes and a Crofer22APU interconnect for use in reversible solid oxide fuel cells (RSOFCs). LaNi0.6Co0.4
Titulo: LaNi0.6Co0.4-xFexO3-δ as Air-Side Contact Material for La0.3Ca0.7Fe0.7Cr0.3O3-δ Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: -xFexO3 (x = 0-0.3) perovskite-type oxides were investigated in this work.
Titulo: LaNi0.6Co0.4-xFexO3-δ as Air-Side Contact Material for La0.3Ca0.7Fe0.7Cr0.3O3-δ Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: The partial substitution of Co by Fe decreased the thermal expansion coefficient values (TEC) closer to the values of the LCFCr and Crofer 22 APU interconnects.
Titulo: LaNi0.6Co0.4-xFexO3-δ as Air-Side Contact Material for La0.3Ca0.7Fe0.7Cr0.3O3-δ Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: The oxides were synthesized using the glycine-nitrate method and were characterized using X-ray thermodiffraction and 4-probe DC electrical conductivity measurements.
Titulo: LaNi0.6Co0.4-xFexO3-δ as Air-Side Contact Material for La0.3Ca0.7Fe0.7Cr0.3O3-δ Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: Based on the materials characterization results from the Fe-doped oxides investigated here, the LaNi0.6Co0.2Fe0.2O3-delta composition was selected as a good candidate for the contact material, as it exhibited an acceptable electrical conductivity value of 395 S center dot cm(-1) at 800 degrees C in air and a TEC value of 14.98 x 10(-6) K-1 (RT-900 degrees C).
Titulo: LaNi0.6Co0.4-xFexO3-δ as Air-Side Contact Material for La0.3Ca0.7Fe0.7Cr0.3O3-δ Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes
